    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_110568</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_110568</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Combined pills for contraception</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kombinierte Pillen für Empfängnisverhütung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pillules combinées pour la contraception</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pills combinados para o contraception</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pillole unite per contraccezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνδυασμένα χάπια για την αντισύλληψη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Píldoras combinadas para la contracepción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations showing hormonal methods for contraception. This illustration shows a form of contraception taken by women, called combined pills.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">combined pills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">contraception</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sexual reproduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen, die hormonale 
Methoden für Empfängnisverhütung zeigen. Diese Abbildung 
zeigt ein Formular der Empfängnisverhütung genommen von den Frauen, 
angerufen kombinierte Pillen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois illustrations montrant des 
méthodes hormonales pour la contraception. Cette illustration 
montre une forme de la contraception prise par des femmes, appelées 
les pillules combinées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações que mostram 
métodos hormonal para o contraception. Esta ilustração mostra
um formulário do contraception feito exame pelas mulheres, chamadas 
pills combinados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano i
metodi ormonali per contraccezione. Questa illustrazione mostra 
una forma della contraccezione presa dalle donne, chiamate pillole 
unite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν ορμονικές 
μεθόδους για την αντισύλληψη. Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει 
μια μορφή της αντισύλληψης που λαμβάνεται από τις γυναίκες, 
αποκαλούμενες συνδυασμένα χάπια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones que muestran los 
métodos hormonales para la contracepción. Esta ilustración 
muestra una forma de contracepción tomada por las mujeres, llamadas 
las píldoras combinadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kombinierte Pillen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Empfängnisverhütung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sexuelle Wiedergabe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pillules combinées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">contraception</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">reproduction sexuelle</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">contraception</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">contraccezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riproduzione sessuale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συνδυασμένα χάπια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντισύλληψη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σεξουαλική αναπαραγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">píldoras combinadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">contracepción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reproducción sexual</string>
          </keyword>
